name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Premium Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: This edition includes the 385 tracks in the Theatrhythm Final Bar Line core game and adds 27 “special music tracks,” plus the 90 tracks from popular Square Enix games included in Season Passes 1, 2 and 3 for the ultimate Square Enix music experience. There is an astounding total of 502 tracks to enjoy!
